page.title: 08THE MID-ESSEX MOBILE LIBRARY
page.content: This service is paid for by Essex County Council from rates.The van ser- ving this area has 5925 books on its catalogue and carries about 3000. The only stopping point in this survey area is{COOKSMILL GREEN}which is visi- ted for 15 minutes on Friday afternoon The majority of readers is elderly and depend on this service to borrow books The average number of customers is 11 with a few more in Winter although in very bad weather no-one comes to change books.{FICTION}is far more popular than non-fiction,the most re- quested author is Catherine Cookson who writes romantic novels. Residents look forward to this weekly visit as it provides a chance to meet each other. The van is a new Ford costing Â£24,000 It should last for at least 9 years. The driver/librarian likes his job.
